translations.translation: He who gives me food and gives me drink;
Who gives me food and drink,
Who gives me food and drink,
It is He who gives me food and drink
“And the One Who feeds me and gives me to drink.”
And it is He Who feeds me and gives me to drink.
And He Who gives me to eat and gives me to drink:
and Himself gives me to eat and drink,
And Who feedeth me and watereth me.
He who gives me food and drink;
He Who feedeth me and giveth me to drink.
and provides me with food and drink,
Who gives me food and drink,
And it is He Who feeds me and gives me to drink.
and He gives me to eat and drink,
He who feeds me, and waters me.
And it is He who feeds me and gives me drink.
[26:79] and provides me with food and drink,
(And Who feedeth me) He provides for me and gives me my full when I am hungry (and watereth me) and gives me to drink when I am thirsty.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَٱلَّذِي هُوَ يُطْعِمُنِي } إن افتقرت إلى الغذاء { وَيَسْقِينِ } [الشعراء: 79] حين احتياجي إلى الماء
